Title: Vaishnavee
Writer: Lester James Peries (story by), Tony Ranasinghe (screenwriter)
Actors: Samadhi Arunachaya, Thumudu Dodantanne, Jayalath Manoratne, Irangani Serasinghe
Plot: 1930's Sri Lanka. A puppeteer is arranged to be married to a young girl, but after she elopes with her lover, the grieving man carves a puppet in her likeness that comes to life, setting in motion a fantastical chain of events.
